tool_description: Age detection can be a challenging problem due to the variations in the aging of every individual depending on one’s health, lifestyle, etc. Analyzing the face of humans using computer vision can help estimate the age of humans as the face holds most of the important attributes showing the age of a person. The model estimates a person’s age from a picture.
name: Age Detector
title: Age Detector

api_list.name: Age detection from image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://age-detector.p.rapidapi.com/age-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "age-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://age-detector.p.rapidapi.com/age-detection"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "age-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
